snippet: At least 129 people have died after a boat sank on Lake Tanganyika in a remote southeastern corner of the Democratic Republic of Congo, provincial authorities said Sunday.
abstract: At least 129 people are dead after boat sinks on Lake Tanganyika in remote southeastern region of the Democratic Republic of Congo; true toll of disaster remains unclear, though 232 people are known to have survived.
lead_paragraph: At least 129 people have died after a boat sank on Lake Tanganyika in a remote southeastern corner of the Democratic Republic of Congo, provincial authorities said Sunday.

headline.main: Congo: Dozens Die as Boat Sinks
headline.print_headline: Congo: Dozens Die as Boat Sinks
